content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate mine at position(-46.5, 70.5)
Consists of following entities
- Electric Mining Drill (position (-46.5, 70.5)) 
- Electric Furnace (position (-46.5, 73.5))
- Wooden Chest (position (-46.5, 75.5))

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to get a non-existent entity
- Verify that an entity exists at the specified position before attempting to retrieve it.

### Errors when placing an entity without having it in the inventory
- Make sure to check if the entity to be placed is available in the inventory before attempting to place it.

### Errors when crafting without required sub-ingredients
- Ensure that all required sub-ingredients are available and can be crafted before attempting to craft a product.
- Check if the required crafting machine or furnace is available for the recipe.

### Errors due to undefined variables
- Ensure that all variables are defined before using them in the code.

### Errors when accessing attributes of a non-existent object
- Verify that an object exists before attempting to access its attributes.

### Errors when output inserter is not found
- Ensure that the output inserter is correctly placed and configured before attempting to use it.

## NAMESPACE

No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
